website_summaries.verdict: A perfect crew sock for weekend athletes and anyone looking for comfort and a bit of compression below the calf.
pros: Excellent fit thanks to a cotton/poly blend with a bit of Spandex so these socks stay in place
Great for short runs or workouts
Comfortable to wear, with a bit of compression through the ankle and cuff
cons: Not much cushioning, which some may find uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Ankle Grabbers
customer_reviews.text: I've had these about a month and have washed and dried several times. They are pilling up and although I like the cushiony sole, they are very tight on the ankle and I've got very skinny ankles. I won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good socks for work
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear black socks for work and these are the perfect length (almost halfway up my shin). I've been through 2 (maybe 3?) packs of these in the last 2.5 years, which is pretty good considering they get between 35-55 hrs per week of walking wear every week. By the end of the work day I'm itching to take them off, literally, because they are compression from the ankle up. However, for the majority of the work day they are comfortable, and preferable to a sock that doesn't have compression.
customer_reviews.author: Samtastic

customer_reviews.title: If your legs aren't sticks, pick other socks.
customer_reviews.text: Nice look. I really wanted them to wear. But they are so tight on the leg I'm not sure if I'll be able to. After I washed them they are even tighter.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Not cushioned like I thought they'd be.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered cushioned sole socks, and there is no difference between the heel/toe areas, and the rest of the material on the bottom of the foot. Not happy, but have opened the package, so I'll have to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Comfy! Fits Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition, the colors on the socks are super bright! for those reviews that are stating these are too small are lying to you. I wear a size 6 1/2, 7 in womens and these fit perfect. They are very stretchy so they can fit a bigger sized foot as well.
customer_reviews.author: Keyara

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased adidas socks that look just like these before in a store and the fit my ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased adidas socks that look just like these before in a store and the fit my feet fine. These ones however are way too small. They are well made, and arrived very promptly... But if they don't fit then that is kind of secondary. I ended up giving these to my mom who has 3 sizes smaller feet. They fit her amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Treach

customer_reviews.title: NOT what they claim
customer_reviews.text: i received these socks a few days ago, washed them because the smell was horrible, went to put them on this morning and could not, they were way too tight. I am a disabled senior citizen who has full body chronic nerve pain. Also, my ankles are very narrow, but could hardly get the sock pass my ankle and could not get it off quick enough. I only shop online because I cannot get to any stores, so after reading other reviews is when I decided to buy these. Yes there were some that gave an unfavorable review, but more that liked these, now here is another review that is unfavorable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Bouton

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Ladies: I read all the reviews talking about the socks being too tight in the ankles. I don't get it. I'm a normal size lady; OK I'm chubby. I love these socks. I have a thing about loose socks. If they are not stretchy and very form fitting to my feet they drive me nuts. These are a nice medium weight sock, stretchy and snug. Perfect. Just ordered another set today.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to using crew socks, and after having ordered, I read many reviews stating that these socks were way too tight on their ankles. I was pretty scared, but I must say that I have not experienced this. I wear a size 8 shoe and I'd say that my ankles are average sized, these socks fit perfectly. My only complaint, is that the arch support doesn't really do anything, it's more aesthetic than functional. Definitely recommend and will be ordering more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wear a 7. 5 and have a very ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5 and have a very thin frame. These socks were very very tight, especially around the ankle & calf.
customer_reviews.author: LawrenceReader

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Thick!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and thick, add great padding to my shoes! They were a tiny bit big but that was to be expected and doesn't really affect how wearable they are all that much (I wear a women's 6.5 shoe). If I had any complaint it would only be that they do make your feet sweat a considerable amount.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the socks and they fit my small feet. But I don't believe they are as good quality as the gray logo ones. They pick very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Quality matters!
customer_reviews.text: I was ecstatic to find these crew socks. The fit and quality is way better than all sold in the big department stores, including the leading sock brand. These cost more but last 10 times longer. Cheaper is not better when the elastic is weak and there is a hole in the heel!
customer_reviews.author: ClassicSeeker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material and well made
customer_reviews.text: Sized perfect for my US 6M women's feet! Somewhat thought the crew sock would go higher on my calves but not having material bunch up in my shoes or boots is worth more than higher on the legs any day for reals.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R Mpls

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is what I have come to expect from Adidas. This is a replacement pack for some Bought 2 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: PAH229

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had any issues with these socks. I've owned my other ones for almost a year with little to no degradation. Zero holes! Bought another pack and need to find more.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who stand/walk a lot
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They make a long work day in 'business casual' shoes on concrete floors far more comfortable and are great for everyday wear as well. I've bought them several times over and have never been disappointed. They're not as padded as ADIDAS's running socks, but since walking/standing is low-impact these work great and aren't as bulky as the running socks.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Crump II

customer_reviews.title: Happy athletic daughter!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is happy. She is a strength and conditioning coach and she loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taybron

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: I wish these were a little thicker but I kept them anyway. Soft but too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Miller

customer_reviews.title: My go-to for everyday wear at work.
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks! I am on my feet all day, and a good comfortable sock makes that a lot easier. I wear these almost every day. They seem to hold up well so far, and didn't fade in the wash. I have way less foot fatigue when I wear these.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdyfarmer

customer_reviews.title: Do not get these.
customer_reviews.text: These are poor quality and thin. The first time I wore a pair they had a hole in one. So I returned them and DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy. It's fun to have the addidas symbol in multiple colors.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Pocheki

customer_reviews.title: not recommended unless you have very small feet
customer_reviews.text: very comphy, nice tight sock on my foot but they are too tight on my ankels. they are also on the thin side. not really worth the price :(
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Bartmess

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but as everyone has mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but as everyone has mentioned, it's tight around the ankle. Personally I have trouble finding long winter boots because I have skinny ankles/calves. Even still, these socks are a little tight for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shirmila

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: This is a repeat purchase -- I love these socks
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Thin socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks were much thinner than I expected, they are also a little tight in the elastic area. I like them for summer time, but would prefer thicker socks during the winter time.
customer_reviews.author: PBJ

customer_reviews.title: so they're good for what they are meant to be on that ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize these were compression socks, so they're good for what they are meant to be on that level.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Brink

customer_reviews.title: Relieved my itchy feet!
customer_reviews.text: The first pairs I bought were from a large members only store and the material let me feet stay dry, unlike dress socks, so that I didn't get the winter itchy feet. These are pretty close, but I am getting a little wetness making my feet cold today. They are still much better than classic dress socks, thicker and stay up great.
customer_reviews.author: KVO

customer_reviews.title: Adidas crew socks quality has declined
customer_reviews.text: The socks have been laundered two or three times, and already the nylon threads at the top of the socks are frayed. Very disappointed with the quality of the materials.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A.

customer_reviews.title: Holds color better.
customer_reviews.text: More cushion than the Nike brand we got at the same time. Holds color better.
customer_reviews.author: Monk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price. I hate white socks, always look dirty. These are good socks. Have bought them for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to get these socks white again. Used every ...
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to get these socks white again. Used every product known to mankind to no avail.get white cotton with grey bottoms. !
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: The material feels cheap for the brand and the price ...
customer_reviews.text: The material feels cheap for the brand and the price tag. They're the same quality as Target C9 socks but twice the price. I was hoping for durable socks that would be more resistant to holes and piling.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lubarsky

customer_reviews.title: These socks fit perfectly. I am a woman with ...
customer_reviews.text: These socks fit perfectly. I am a woman with size 7.5 feet. They are just cushion-y enough and not too thick for my workout shoes, both runners and lifters.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Torocco

customer_reviews.title: No I wasn't happy with these socks
customer_reviews.text: No I wasn't happy with these socks. I've bought Adidas from Amazon before, and I love them. The ones that I sent for this time, were too small and definitely not as what was pictured., like the ones I had bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: pastelbaby

customer_reviews.title: Very tight cuff
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in these socks....firstly they are on the short side and the cuff is very tight, nor are they soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mallon

customer_reviews.title: Athletic socks
customer_reviews.text: A little snug, but I like them. They feel great once they are on!
customer_reviews.author: C. Machowski

customer_reviews.title: only socks i wear for work
customer_reviews.text: These are the only socks I were to work. They are comfortable and supportive but not constricting. I have to wear steel toe work boots that cover the ankles (8"). They are just the right height to fit these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Quey NY

customer_reviews.title: strong elastic, cushy.
customer_reviews.text: the elastic is tight on calves for me, and even tight for my very thin 9-yr old. if you have think legs at all, these will squeeze you. Otherwise, thick and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving Adidas
customer_reviews.text: Awesome socks and fit perfectly to me around the ankles. I didn't see anything wrong with them and they were the right price for the amount of pairs of socks.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are very good socks and provide much needed support to my ankles and feet.
customer_reviews.author: TCB

customer_reviews.title: but stretch to the perfect size after wearing them a few
customer_reviews.text: where a little snug when I first bought them, but stretch to the perfect size after wearing them a few times
customer_reviews.author: Chel

customer_reviews.title: A good sock, but not very thick.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased these same socks a few years prior. They were thicker than my new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Takara

customer_reviews.title: No seams, comfortable socks!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only socks I can wear. I have foot problems, and these are perfect for me. The value and price are good!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: These wash beautifully. Soft. They reach my sock quality standard. What can you see about socks :•)
customer_reviews.author: Mouser1953

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but
customer_reviews.text: These are nice socks, good quality, but they are very tight. I would get a size bigger then you normally get.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gosnell

customer_reviews.title: These socks are great. Thinner than I prefer
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great. Thinner than I prefer, but I do buy the thick comfort running socks whenever I can find them.
customer_reviews.author: bekmlo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Original review: Feels great! Tight fit, warm and soft, light size and length up the leg. 10/10 would recommend 6 months after: holes in socks... DO NOT recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Adidas super Crew socks ! Best
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks- the weave and contour and the quality are superb! Wick moisture never sticky no matter how steamy the feet get during the day. So comfy forget to take them off. Don't stretch and loose there shape.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Vafides

customer_reviews.title: Okay for everyday socks.
customer_reviews.text: These are decent socks, but not as good of quality as the last time I bought Adidas socks. The material is thinner and does not provide much support.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Not right for me.
customer_reviews.text: The foot part of the sock is nice. It is a good medium thickness. However, the upper part that goes over the ankle and lower calf, is quite tight.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: A little thin and very, very tight
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and wash well, but I wanted a real crew -- i.e. thicker. Also, elastic is so tight I have demarcation lines and puffing above the elastic line when I take them off, and I'm kinda skinny and active....
customer_reviews.author: A.R.N.

customer_reviews.title: Great socks. I like these because they stay up
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. I like these because they stay up, but there aren't any power bands (those elastic strips) which is why I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B.

customer_reviews.title: These socks are amazing..
customer_reviews.text: These socks are amazing...for socks I mean. They keep my feet warm and dry which keeps me smiling. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: T. Tweety

customer_reviews.title: What can you say about socks?
customer_reviews.text: we're talking socks, right. nothing epic, but they work :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: They don't really fit right
customer_reviews.text: These socks look and feel great until you put the on. The foot portion is a little too long; the top of the sock is too tight. I found myself peeling these socks off as soon as I got home. I gave them away.
customer_reviews.author: smokinjj

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks. Soft and very comfortable with my running shoes.. The tops could be a little shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Socks are ok but they are hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: They are hard to get on a size 8 foot. I probably will give them to someone who has a smaller foot
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, wick moisture well.
customer_reviews.text: These are comfy, stretchy, and fit great. They wick moisture well and my feet don't get stinky. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bluebird

customer_reviews.title: will probably buy again
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it, who uses it for volleyball. Gives nice cushion, has kept its elasticity after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: john 3:16

customer_reviews.title: My daughters loved them even more than the Mizuno socks I had ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughters loved them even more than the Mizuno socks I had purchased. Great product which I had found these first!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable...somewhat tight around the my leg, but I am not a small person. I am sure they would be perfect for an average leg.
customer_reviews.author: honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks so much!! Can't seem to find them in any store.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These socks are good quality...not just a logo you're paying for.
customer_reviews.author: trina1999

customer_reviews.title: Says they fit great, and are very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife, and she absolutely LOVES them! Says they fit great, and are very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Mutchler

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY SOCKS FOR YEAR ROUND USE
customer_reviews.text: Warm cozy blend with a generous fit, but not bulky. Worn inside all my boots this winter has made a huge difference in keeping my feet warm and dry. I would definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable socks. They stay up and provide a nice soft cushion for my aging, sore feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H

customer_reviews.title: I expected them to feel like the ankle length addidas socks but they're not as ...
customer_reviews.text: The seam across the toes is a little heavy and rough. I expected them to feel like the ankle length addidas socks but they're not as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these socks
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these socks. The moment I put them on, I thought, "These are the socks my feet have been looking for my whole life."
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Quality not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I had bought Adidas athletic socks at Marshalls in my neighborhood and liked them very much. So when I saw these on Amazon, I was very excited. I thought they were the same ones; however, they were a lower quality- different weave (not as reinforced) along the instep. So I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Caren S.

customer_reviews.title: Socks
customer_reviews.text: I really like the socks and would buy them again. They are very comfortable and feel very soft. The price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Ann Duffie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit and feel great! Wish they were more odor reducing like my other athletic socks.
customer_reviews.author: junglegirl08

customer_reviews.title: nice fit, noticed a difference almost right away - ...
customer_reviews.text: very comfy, nice fit, noticed a difference almost right away - feet are drier at the end of the day
customer_reviews.author: Janet Taylor

customer_reviews.title: They fit nicely, breathe well and hold up
customer_reviews.text: Loves these. They fit nicely, breathe well and hold up.
customer_reviews.author: H.W.

customer_reviews.title: Poor sizing
customer_reviews.text: These must be meant for Girls not Women. The elastic tops were uncomfortably tight and dug into my legs. I didn't have this problem with "no name" sox, so I was surprised that these fit so poorly.
customer_reviews.author: oinkRus

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than my other ones
customer_reviews.text: This item is a decent price, nothing amazing. But the socks were thinner than what I had purchased in the past. They still do the trick, but just not as good of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Conboy

customer_reviews.title: Good socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are quite comfortable and soft and do not slide at all. But they are almost pure polyester and make my feet sweat and smell. So it is a preference thing for most. They are comfortable, so I am saddened by this fact.
customer_reviews.author: tanus

customer_reviews.title: Too tight.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these socks for years. The tops are too tight and I have skinny ankles. The ones with the stripes on the bottom for better.
customer_reviews.author: SUEBELL

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENTE
customer_reviews.text: MUY BUENO EL PRODUCTO Y LOS SERVICIOS DEL VENDEDOR COMO NINGÚN OTRO DE MI PARTE ES ALTAMENTE RECOMENDADO SENORES SERVICIO DE PRIMERA CALIDAD
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Viloria

customer_reviews.title: I walk every morning and these socks are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I read a review that said the socks did not fit because they were too small. I wear a size 9 shoe and these socks fit perfectly. I walk every morning and these socks are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Finally, socks my wife will wear. Went through several styles and brands for her...these are keepers.
customer_reviews.author: ccalvo

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Athletic Crew Sock (6-Pack)
product_meta.description: Quality, comfort, and durability is what you are looking for in your everyday sock and the adidas 6-pack delivers on all of your needs. now, with the addition of arch compression, this sock delivers a secure fit and gives you the best sock to handle your day to day.
feature_bullets: Machine wash in cold with like colors. Non-chlorine bleach. Tumble dry low
Cushioned in the foot for comfort and durability
Moisture-wicking yarn keeps your feet dry from sweat
Arch compression for a secure fit
